name: TransCanada
description: Trump also has a small investment in Canadian energy company TransCanada, the developer of Keystone XL pipeline, which was rejected by President Barack Obama last year but supported by Trump.

stories.description: Trump also has a small investment in Canadian energy company TransCanada, the developer of Keystone XL pipeline, which was rejected by President Barack Obama last year but supported by Trump.
stories.headline: Trump's Stock Portfolio: Big Oil, Big Banks And More Foreign Connections
